title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5313.13 - License plate recognition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5313.13 - License plate recognition

State Regulations

The commission may require a gaming facility licensee to
install security and surveillance equipment in garages and parking lots to
capture a vehicle license plate. Such system must be able to include the time, color image and the vehicle's license plate number. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5313.13

Adopted

New

York State Register July 20, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
